thread.title: 2015 Dope Cup Oregon cannabis awards held in Portland (Photos)
thread.title_full: 2015 Dope Cup Oregon cannabis awards held in Portland (Photos) | OregonLive.com

author: Randy L. Rasmussen | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: 2015 Dope Cup Oregon cannabis awards held in Portland (Photos)
text:
It was a night of celebration as Seattle-based DOPE magazine brought the 2015 DOPE Cup Oregon cannabis awards to a crowd at Refuge in Southeast Portland on Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015.
Chalice Farms , of Portland, won the "People's Choice" award for the night, walking away with a huge red-based trophy and a custom-made glass pipe from Mary Jane's House of Glass .
This is the first year for the competition in Oregon though it it's been on-going in Washington for the last four years.
Outside the awards ceremony was essentially a trade show for the blossoming cannabis market. On Oct. 1, recreational use of marijuana was legalized in Oregon.
--Randy L. Rasmussen
